import sys
def main():
	lis = []
	lis.append(1)
	lis.append(2)
	i = 2
	while i <= 1000:
		lis.append(lis[i-1]+lis[i-2])
		i += 1
	i -= 1
	num = i 
	i = raw_input()
	s = i.split()
	a = int(s[0])
	b = int(s[1])	

	while a + b != 0 :
		i = 0 
		while i <= num :
			if lis[i] >= a :
				break ;
			i += 1
		if lis[i] == a :
			count = 1
		else :
			count = 0

		while i <= 1000 :
			if lis[i] >= b :
				break ;
			i += 1
			count += 1

		if lis[i] == b :
			count += 1
		if a == b :
			count -= 1

		print count
		
		s = raw_input()
		s = s.split()
		a = int(s[0])
		b = int(s[1])


if __name__ == '__main__':
	main()
